title: Genetic Algorithm Visualizer
description: Genetic Algorithms are heuristic search and optimization techniques inspired by the process of natural selection. They are used to find solutions to complex problems and are particularly useful in optimization, search, and machine learning domains. With the Genetic Algorithm Visualizer, you can observe the step-by-step execution of a Genetic Algorithm, understand how populations evolve over generations, and witness the algorithm's ability to find optimal solutions.

title: Personality Test
description: This is a captivating web-based application that provides users with a unique and enlightening experience to delve into the depths of their personality. Through a series of thoughtfully designed and meticulously crafted questions, individuals are presented with a captivating journey of self-discovery. As they navigate through the test, users get an opportunity to gain valuable insights into their personality traits, preferences, and behaviors, leading to a greater understanding of themselves.

title: Personal Portfolio
technologies: JS | React | Git | Bootstrap | HTML | CSS
description: As a developer and enthusiast, I created this portfolio website to showcase my expertise, projects, and achievements to potential employers, collaborators, and the wider community. The website provides a comprehensive overview of my skills and experiences, highlighting my technical proficiency and passion for technology.

title: Quiz
description: A quiz app on the fundamentals of JavaScript. There are 5 randomly selected multiple-choice questions and the user will have a time limit of 50 seconds. The remaining time will determine their score at the end. The user will be penalised by 10 seconds for every incorrect answer.

title: P1
description: Welcome to P1, your virtual pit stop for the latest updates and standings in the world of F1. But that's not allâ€”we've also got the ultimate card game where driver knowledge is the key to victory.

title: Planner
description: Make every hour count with this simple Daily Planner App. You can keep track of all important appointments during a normal 9-5 work day!
